name: Wave Cursor
description: Changes your in-game cursor to your wave icon

cursor-size.name: Cursor size
cursor-size.description: How large should the cursor appear?

enable-trail.name: Enable Trail
enable-trail.description: Enable or disable showing a trail following the mouse cursor

trail-type.name: Trail type
trail-type.description: What type of trail should the mouse inherit?

always-force-hide-cursor.name: Always force hide cursor.
always-force-hide-cursor.description: Hide the platform cursor every game update. This may fix some issues with the platform cursor reappearing, but may cause issues on MacOS!
